org.semanticweb.kaon2.extensionapi.builtins
Interface ExpressionEvaluatorContext

public interface ExpressionEvaluatorContext

Represents a context for the expression evaluators. Through this interface, the evaluator can gain access to other objects involved in reasoning.

Method Summary
 Ontology getOntology()
          Returns the ontology in which the evaluator has been invoked.
 Reasoner getReasoner()
          Returns the reasoner in which the evaluator has been invoked.
